DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Whole exome and transcriptome sequencing of biliary tract cancer
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: To uncover the full repertoire of genetic and transcriptomic landscape of biliary tract cancer (BTC), we molecularly characterized BTC based on genetic and transcriptomic alteration profiles.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: To uncover the full repertoire of genetic and transcriptomic landscape of biliary tract cancer (BTC), we molecularly characterized BTC based on genetic and transcriptomic alteration profiles.
DESCRIPTOR.CENTER_PROJECT_NAME: Genomic landscape of biliary tract cancer
